channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: AAA Realities Asset Bundle
item.content:encoded: Game developers, form your own realities—harness the power of gaming and unleash your creativity with this bundle of AAA-quality assets from ScansMatter. This high-quality collection features environments, models, and animations for use in Unreal Engine and Unity like hyper-realistic bins, bricks, and office buildings. Get the assets you need to help bring your game to life—from cobblestone roads to cold metal floors. Plus your purchase helps support the World Wildlife Fund!

item.title: Legendary Game Dev Environments Bundle
item.content:encoded: Game developers—it’s time to build new and unique worlds with this bundle of 5000+ legendary game assets from Leartes Studios! This high-quality collection features environments, models, animations, and more for use in Unreal Engine and Unity. Recreate the post-WW2 Era with the 1950s NYC Environment Megapack. Build a mighty castle setting with the Fantasy Castle Environment. Or curate your own magical garden lands with the Stylized Paradise Gardens. Get the assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support Care.org with your purchase!

item.title: Skills Hub: Get that Promotion
item.description: Big promotions only a bundle away
item.content:encoded: The Growth Mindset should be at the forefront of every career-minded individual. With hot courses like Winning at Sales and Managing Conflict—the Humble Skills Hub: Get That Promotion Bundle is a one-stop-shop for go-getters. This 20+ course bundle will give you the knowledge you seek to take your career in sales, marketing, and more to the next level. Take your passion for productivity and growth to a new frontier and help support Alzheimer's Research UK with your purchase.

item.title: Become a 3D Artist - Mega Tutorial Bundle
item.description: Creativity unlocked with a digital paintbrush
item.content:encoded: Unlock new beauty of creating vast digital worlds—Artists, it's time to become a 3D artist with this outstanding bundle of tutorials from FastTrackTutorials! Our high-quality collection features 30+ tutorials focusing on environments, characters, models, textures, and more for use in Unreal Engine, Unity, Blender, Zbrush and many more. Get the education you need to bring your art to life, and help support the World Wildlife Fund with your purchase!

item.title: RPG Maker Beyond Expectations Bundle
item.description: The magic of RPG Maker unleashed
item.content:encoded:
Love RPGs? Start making your own with the all new RPG Maker Beyond Expectations Bundle by Gotcha Gotcha Games. Unlock your creativity through the powerful medium of video games—you’ll be surprised how user-friendly RPG Maker is too. Within this amazing bundle, you’ll gain access to premium engine tools like RPG Maker Unite, Pixel Game Maker MV, RPG MAKER VX Ace, and more! Feel the freedom of expressing your personal style through game development—show off your love for anime, high-fantasy, steam-punk, and more. Make your own games and help support Extra Life with your purchase!

Check out the RPG Maker 2025 Game Jam here!

item.title: The Best of Synty Game Dev Assets
item.description: Turbo charge your game dev skills
item.content:encoded: Game developers, build amazing worlds with this bundle of Synty polygon assets and more! Bring your projects to life quicker and make your dream game a reality while supporting a great cause. Synty assets are fully customizable and easy to use, making them accessible for game developers of all levels. *Compatible with Unity and Unreal game engines—this high-quality collection features environments, characters, meshes, models, animations, and more for use. These Synty game dev assets are sure to inspire beginners and seasoned developers alike!

item.title: The Ultimate Game Dev Music Bundle
item.description: The sweet sounds of our latest bundle
item.content:encoded: The right soundtrack will elevate your prized project to new heights. Create the perfect audioscape for your game with The Ultimate Game Dev Music Bundle. This 50+ asset bundle features slick samurai music, scary slasher sounds, and others like Paranormal Evening, Beyond the Horizon, and The Invincibles. Don’t short your game’s soundtrack—get the ultimate collection of assets you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for, and help support Make-A-Wish with your purchase!

item.title: Becoming a C# and Unity Game Developer by Packt
item.description: A+ courses to master C# and more
item.content:encoded: Become a C# and Unity game developer with our latest super bundle by Packt! Our comprehensive collection will help you level up your skills in game creation, with hot course like Build an Endless Runner Game in 3D - Unity 6 Compatible and Create Minecraft-Inspired Voxel Worlds - Unity 6 Compatible. This 15+ course bundle will give you the knowledge you seek to begin an exciting new career. Take your passion for gaming to a new frontier and help support Alzheimer’s Research UK with your purchase

item.title: 85 Miniatures Designed for Easy 3D Printing
item.content:encoded: It’s time to unleash your creativity and start printing your own 3D miniatures from home. Our latest bundle by HighCraft Miniatures features 85 unique mini schematics to fit any style. 3D printing continues to advance at an amazing rate—don’t fall behind this exciting technology, embrace it and fall in love with a new hobby. Print Grogs, Dagors, Pirate Toads, and style them any way you want. Paint amazing miniatures, and help support Code.org with your purchase!

item.title: FALLOUT: The Roleplaying Game Complete Collection for Alchemy VTT
item.content:encoded: It’s time to take your FALLOUT: The Roleplaying Game™ adventures to new heights! Wander the Wasteland online with the complete collection of Modiphius’ award-winning tabletop RPG made specifically for the cinematic virtual tabletop, Alchemy RPG. In this collection of Alchemy Content Modules, you’ll get core rules, expanded rules, adventures, campaigns, NPCs, and loads of new gear to collect, scrap, and craft. Dial up the immersion on game night with the Alchemy Enhanced edition of the Core Rulebook and get exclusive motion scenes, ambient sound loops, and an original dynamic score that will transport your players into the post-atomic world of FALLOUT. Every module includes: A digital adaptation of the original book Fully mechanicalized game components like NPC, items, and automations Alchemy’s core Fallout integration with dice automations and smart character sheets Hundreds of art assets to amplify your adventures Another settlement needs your help! Get this complete collection of games at one incredible price and support Direct Relief, supporting wildfire-impacted communities in California.
